item.title: Today in History - October 2: The first high-five is far more recent than you may assume
item.description: <p>When baseballer Dusty Baker hit his 30th home run of the season on October 2, 1977, his Los Angeles Dodgers teammate Glenn Burke raised his hand in celebration.</p>

item.title: Podcast reveals police investigation shortcomings into teen girls who vanished 45 years ago
item.description: <p>Elaine Johnson was 16 years old when she went missing along with her friend Kerry Anne Joel 45 years ago. They were dismissed as runaways.</p>

item.title: 'Oh no, not again': Kayakers survive close encounter with huge great white shark off Perth
